        public static void doBoom(SWGameBean game,
                          int lon,
                          int lat,
                          int dep,
                          long now)
        Do boom. Torpedo explosions get recorded by the microphones of nearby ships. Even if they aren't in listen mode.

        game - the game
        lon - the longitude
        lat - the lattitude
        dep - the depth
